New Records: West Indies were bowled out for their 4th lowest total in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Pathum Nissanka was the star with a half ton.
Dunith Wellalage began things as he got King and after that, wickets just kept falling.
Theekshana, Asalanka, and Hasaranga joined the party with wickets.
Matheesha Pathirana also got a wicket to his name at the end.
Rovman Powell mentioned they did well to keep Sri Lanka down to 160.
Charith Asalanka credited the way Dunith Wellalage played.
Pre-Game Insights: The host’s bowling unit could do much better by delivering some key wickets in the powerplay, which ended up being their downfall in the previous game.
Expect the conditions in Dambulla to be nice and cool with very low chances of rain. Temperatures will be around 26 degrees Celsius but at around 90 per cent humidity.
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka said it’s an important win for them and he’s happy he won the toss.
Rovman Powell mentioned they have an opportunity to reflect on their mistakes and do well in the next game.
Pathum Nissanka, MAN OF THE MATCH, said he had a special plan when he played the spin bowlers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The decider is to be played on the 17th of this month.
